summary: THE CUE INFOTAINMENT SYSTEM IS STARTING TO FAIL. SEVERAL SELECTIONS I.E. "MEDIA" AND "SCAN" ARE NOT WORKING. THE CLEAR SCREEN COVER HAS STARTED TO CRACK. IT HAS COME TO MY ATTENTION THAT THIS IS A WIDESPREAD PROBLEM TO THE DEGREE THAT THE SYSTEM FAILS TOTALLY SHUTTING DOWN ALL THE MUSIC CAPABILITIES, REAR CAMERA, AND USE OF THE ON STAR NAVIGATION SYSTEM AS WELL.
